trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs> is created when the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object raises the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs> é criado quando o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> objeto gera o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged> evento.

trans-unit.source: To obtain the values for the new and the previous <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState>, access the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.PreviousState> properties in the handler for the event.
trans-unit.target: Para obter os valores para a nova e a anterior <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState>, acesso a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A> e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.PreviousState> propriedades no manipulador para o evento.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the information that is available about the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra as informações disponíveis sobre o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged> evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> before the <see cref="E:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged" /> event.
Returns the state of the synthesizer before the state changed.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o estado do sintetizador antes que o estado é alterado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.PreviousState%2A> property represents the synthesizer state with a member of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.PreviousState%2A> propriedade representa o estado do sintetizador com um membro do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState> enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> before the <see cref="E:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged" /> event.
The state of the synthesizer after the state changed.
trans-unit.target: O estado do sintetizador depois que o estado é alterado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A> property represents the synthesizer state with a member of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A> propriedade representa o estado do sintetizador com um membro do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState> enumeração.
